Package com.developersboard.config.core

Class DevConfig

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.config.core.DevConfig
@Configuration @Profile("dev") public class DevConfig extends Object
This class provides every bean, and other configurations needed to be used in the development phase.
Since:
1.0
